Email 1.subject: RE: Updated Quotes Needed - multiple items

body.text:
Dear  Jim  ,



Mr.  Darshan  Desai  is  our  New  Sales  head   and  eventually  Komal
will  Report  to  Mr.  Darshan  and  Mr.  Darshan  Will  Report  to  Me.



Regarding  Tariff  Issue  ,  we  Came  to  know  that  our  HSN Code
34024200/34023900  are  excluded  from  additional  tariff  and   current
tariff  is  Same  as  2024 , 5%.



Pls.  Check  and  Confirm  ??



*

Email 2.subject: RE: Updated Quotes Needed - multiple items

body.text:
Thanks Komal

Please also confirm what HTS Code Matangi is using for paperwork.



Please confirm who Darshan is and their role.  That is a new name.



We will not be able to get any business with the SML price – the landed
cost is well above the market price in the US – is there anything else you
can do to get a better, competitive price?



Jim Wolfe



*Paramount Colors, Inc.*

340 RENNER DRIVE, BUILDING C, ELGIN, IL 60123

C: 330-219-4241

http://www.paramountcolors.com

ISO 9001:2015 Certified Company

Email 3.subject: RE: Updated Quotes Needed - multiple items

body.text:
Dear Jim,


Good Afternoon !



Thanks for your information.



Kindly find below our best offer,



Product            : Sorbitan Mono Laurate (Vizol SL 729)

Price                 : USD 2400/MT FOB India Port



Product            : Polysorbate 80(HG) - (Nutrimat P 8)

Price                 : USD 1830/MT FOB India Port



Product            : Sorbitan Mono Oleate(HG) – (Nutrimat RS 080)

Price                 : USD 1900/MT FOB India Port



Product            : 2-Phenoxy Ethanol 5ppm (Matpers PH 395)

Price                 : USD 1870/MT FOB India Port



Packing            : 1000kg IBC Tank

Lead time         : 3-4 weeks after receiving the confirmed order

Offer validity   : Subject to reconfirmation at the time of order placement

Rest of term remain same.



Looking forward to your confirmation on above shared price

Email 4.subject: RE: Updated Quotes Needed - multiple items

body.text:
Hi Ramesh/Komal

The tariff situation has done nothing but further complicate the market and
potentially put us further at a disadvantage.

We need to check with you on some aggressive quotes for the following:



Vizol SL 729 (SML) ideally we need to be $1800USD/MT – last month it was
not anywhere close to this – but please give me your best option.
Potentially 15-18 containers, 5-6 to dispatch per month.

Nutrimat P8 (PS80) full specification, including 1,4 Dioxane Spec and EO
Spec are critical.  This is a huge wild card, potentially 3 to 8 containers
a month for the rest of the year.  Very price sensitive.   We need below
$1800USD/MT, and we were not close last month and the off spec can’t be
used in these markets.  May need one container to be mixed with drums.

Nutrimat RS 080 1-2 containers a month.

Matpers PH 395, 12-20 drums.



Let me know.

Thanks

Jim
